summary.para: Defines a helper class that can be used to validate objects, properties, and methods when it is included in their associated attributes.

remarks.para: This method evaluates each instance that is attached to the object type.

summary.para: Determines whether the specified object is valid using the validation context.

Docs.param: The context that describes the object to validate.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ValidateObject (object instance, System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationContext validationContext, bool validateAllProperties);

remarks.para: This method evaluates each instance that is attached to the object type.

summary.para: Determines whether the specified object is valid using the validation context, and a value that specifies whether to validate all properties.

Docs.param: The context that describes the object to validate.
true to validate all properties; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: This method tests each instance that is associated with the property identified by the parameter.

Docs.param: The context that describes the property to validate.
